official.headline: Harmonists Steady System
official.anchor_line: The Harmonists have successfully stabilized the BCI system in Stenograd, maintaining efficiency and public trust.
official.contextual_reframing: Through careful management, systemic synchronization is progressing smoothly, ensuring continuity in governance and services.

underground.headline: Harmonists Tighten Grip
underground.anchor_line: The Harmonists hold power, keeping the system on life support while unrest simmers.
underground.contextual_reframing: System glitches are labeled 'progress' as public concerns are muted, but protests reveal the cracks.
